source.name: New Mexico Agencies Behind on Their Audits
source.description: New Mexico state Auditor Hector Balderas recently spoke with The Santa Fe Reporter regarding the more than $1 billion his office believes is unaccounted for due to public agencies not filing timely audits (a violation of state law). That story is here: http://www.sfreporter.com/santafe/article-5728-dont-count-on-it.html This is the complete list of New Mexico agencies that are behind on their audits, supplemented with reporting from SFR on their budgets and other factors.
